attributes.action: stop penalizing british citizens over global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Other countries in the world contibute more to so called green house gases, ie USA; China; Russia etc yet we pay among the highest rates of taxation in order to 'combat global warming' Instead of taxing fuel as this government always appear to do, it should concentrate on educating other countries as to the effect of running their large cars and coal fired power stations... Lower tax on fuels to that of the USA until they raise theirs in line with the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
